name: Unprepared Adventurer
description:
Controls:

WASD: Moving character.

O: Pick up item.

P: Use item.

NOTE: When the game loads click it so you can move.

Unprepared Adventurer is my submission to the Game Maker's Toolkit 2019 Game Jam.

The theme was: 'Only one', So I decided to go with 'Only one Item Slot'.

Resources:

TileSet: https://piratepoots.itch.io/dungeon-starter
